episodes.title: 288. Is Jared Leto A Cult Leader?
episodes.description: Kelli and Troy rehash all of the allegations against Jared Leto, from his alleged cult leader status to his alleged role as one of Hollywood's most persistent predators. This episode is definitely on the rotted side.
